00012 class qcl_config_manager extends qcl_jsonrpc_object
00013 {
00014 
00015         //-------------------------------------------------------------
00016         // internal methods
00017         //------------------------------------------------------------- 
00018    
00022         function __construct()
00023         {
00024                 parent::__construct();
00025                 $this->config   = qcl_config::getSubclass($this->ini);
00026         }
00027         
00028         //-------------------------------------------------------------
00029         // public rpc methods 
00030         //-------------------------------------------------------------   
00031    
00036         function method_updateClient($params)
00037         {
00038                 $mask   = $params[0];
00039                 $rows   = $this->config->getAll( $mask );
00040                 $result = array();
00041                 foreach ( $rows as $row )
00042                 {
00043                         unset($row[$this->config->key_id]);
00044                         $result[$row[$this->config->key_name]] = $row;
00045                 }
00046                 $this->set( "configMap", $result );
00047                 return $this->getResult(); 
00048         }
00049         
00054         function method_updateServer($params)
00055         {
00056                 $map = $params[1];
00057                 foreach( get_object_vars( $map ) as $key => $value )
00058                 {
00059                         $this->config->set( $key, $value );
00060                 }               
00061                 return $this->getResult(); 
00062         }
00063 
00064         
00079         function method_create($params)
00080         {
00081                 $id = $this->config->create(
00082                         $params[1]->name, 
00083                         $params[1]->type, 
00084                         $params[1]->permissionRead, 
00085                         $params[1]->permissionWrite,
00086                         $params[1]->allowUserVariants
00087                 );
00088                 $this->addMessage( "qcl.config.messages.key.created", $id );
00089                 return $this->getResult();
00090         } 
00091         
00101         function method_update( $params )
00102         {
00103                 $id     = $params[1];
00104                 $key    = $params[2];
00105                 $value  = $params[3];
00106                 
00107                 $this->config->update($id,$key,$value);
00108                 $this->addMessage( "qcl.config.messages.key.updated", $id );
00109                 
00110                 if ( $key == "value" )
00111                 {
00112                         $row = $this->config->getRowById($id);
00113                         $data = array();
00114                         $data[$row[$this->config->key_name]] = $row[$this->config->key_value]; 
00115                         $this->addMessage( "qcl.config.messages.server.changeConfigKey", $data );       
00116                 }
00117                 return $this->getResult();
00118         }
00119         
00120         
00128         function method_delete( $params )
00129         { 
00130                 $this->config->delete($params[1]);
00131                 return $this->getResult();
00132         } 
00133  
00143         function method_set( $params )
00144         {
00145                 $this->config->set( $params[0], $params[1], $params[2] );
00146                 $data = array();
00147                 $data[$params[0]] = $params[1];
00148                 $this->addMessage( "qcl.config.messages.server.changeConfigKey", $data );
00149                 return $this->getResult();
00150         }
00151         
00157         function method_getAll( $params )
00158         {
00159                 $rows = $this->config->getAll( $params[0] );
00160                 $table = array();
00161                 
00162                 foreach( $rows as $row )
00163                 {
00164                         $userId         = $row[$this->config->key_userId];
00165                         $user           = $userId ? $this->user->getById($userId) : null;
00166                         $userName       = $user ? $user[$this->user->key_namedId] : $userId ;
00167                         $row[$this->config->key_userId] = $userName;
00168                         $table[] = array_values($row);
00169                 }
00170                 $this->set( "tabledatamodel", $table );
00171                 return $this->getResult();
00172         }
00173 }
